page.title: 13SCHOOL SPORTSDAY
page.content: FOR THE LAST TEN YEARS AT BURRINGTON SCHOOL WE HAVE HAD A SPORTSDAY. WE HAVE THREE TEAMS.THEY ARE SUN, MOON AND STARS. WE USUALLY HAVE ABOUT TWENTY FIVE DIFFERENT EVENTS. THERE ARE SPRINTS, DISTANCE RACES, TUG OF WAR, OBSTACLE RACES, HIGH JUMP, LONG JUMP, EGG AND SPOON RACES, HURDLES AND LOTS MORE. THE WINNER GETS THREE POINTS,THE NEXT PERSON GETS TWO POINTS,AND THE LAST PERSON GETS ONE POINT. WE WEAR COLOURED BANDS TO SHOW WHICH TEAM WE BELONG TO. YELLOW IS FOR SUN, BLUE IS FOR MOON AND RED IS FOR STARS. WE RACE ALL AFTERNOON IN THE HOT SUN, IF WE ARE LUCKY WITH THE WEATHER THAT IS! WHEN WE HAVE FINISHED WE HAVE A VERY COOL DRINK AND A BISCUIT. WHEN WE HAVE HAD OUR DRINK WE TAKE SOME APPARATUS BACK TO SCHOOL THEN WE GET CHANGED READY TO GO HOME.
